column1: The '''Great West Road''' was the name of the portion of the '''[[Great Road]]''' east of the [[Fords of Isen]] and was known as a '''horse-road'''.<ref>{{UT
column2: Index}}</ref> Practically it connected [[Edoras]] with [[Minas Tirith]]<ref>{{FR
column3: Map}}</ref> where it was mentioned as the '''North-way'''.<ref>{{RK

column1: Two miles east from the [[Isen]] it bent sharply to the south-east to meet the [[Deeping-road]] and again bent to the east and [[Edoras]].<ref>{{UT
column2: Isen}}; as '''horse-road'''</ref> It passed across [[Calenardhon]]/[[Rohan]] parallel to the [[White Mountains]], the [[Folde]], the [[Fenmark
column4: Firien Wood]] into [[Anórien]]. It ran around the [[Drúadan Forest]] and ran to the south into the [[Pelennor Fields]], outside of [[Minas Anor]]. It then passed over [[Erui]] at the [[Crossings of Erui]], and reached [[Pelargir]].<ref>{{RK
